text: @senatemajldr Your use of the word ”should” to ANYONE sickens me Moscow Mitch. You sound like a ”holier than thou” BASTARD of the shitty Senate. You're the most unethical, biased, racist, prejudiced, dishonest, coniving, deceitful POS in the Senate.   Go breath in some Italian coronavirus air.
